item.title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound (PS5) Hits a New Low Price at Amazon
item.content:encoded:
For those stocking up their game library for the winter months ahead, Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound for PS5 (one of our favorite action games of 2025) has dropped to a new low price of $31.12 at Amazon (see it here). If you've had your eye on it, now is a great time to add it to your virtual shopping cart. It's one we certainly think is worth the investment, too.

Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound (PS5) for $31.12

NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound - Playstation 5

Writer Will Borger had very high praise for Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound in his review. He explains that it, "looks and sounds incredible, and the fast but thoughtful combat is so damn satisfying that I had a hard time putting it down long enough to write this review." He even exclaims that, "Ninja Gaiden fans, we were lost in the desert for a long time, but Ragebound is like running across an oasis; trust me when I tell you we’ve never been so back."

That's not the only praise this game received, either. Ragebound even secured a runner-up spot in our nominees list for the best action game of 2025, thanks to how it "reimagines and modernizes the classic stylings of old-school, 2D Ninja Gaiden with a unique hypercharge mechanic that encourages you to think not just about the order in which you dispatch your enemies, but the tool they use as well." If that's sold you on it, it's worth noting that the game above also sets you up with the soundtrack and a booklet, which is a fun bonus.

The game deals don't end there, though. We've found a couple more 2025 releases that have received some nice discounts over at Amazon, including Assassin’s Creed Shadows for PS5 and Donkey Kong Bananza. Walmart's also offering some nice deals at the moment, with Battlefield 6 among them and marked down to $40.

Hannah Hoolihan is a freelancer who writes with the guides and commerce teams here at IGN.
